button.name: slot_viewer
button.OnLeftDown: keymapper -rememberholdmappedkey "ISB42 - Video FX Layout" "View All Slots" "ISB42_Video_FX_Layout_View_All_Slots" "self" return
button.OnLeftClick: keymapper -rememberreleasemappedkey "ISB42_Video_FX_Layout_View_All_Slots"

button.name: is1_main
button.OnLeftClick: uplink focus is1
button.OnRightDown: keymapper -rememberholdmappedkey "ISB42 - Video FX Layout" "Toggle View Slot 1" "ISB42_Video_FX_Layout_Toggle_View_Slot_1" "self" return

is1_assist
